description:
Fufu Tools is a toolbox with a collection of gadgets.


> With several starts(Branches), but just one end(Release)~

> [!TIP]
> 此版本的所有Issue/PR，请见 [Milestone 1.3.8](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/milestone/6)
> 独立开发工具包仓库 → [DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools)

## 修改
*(这里相对的是上一个正式版[1.3.7](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/releases/tag/v1.3.7))*

### 新功能
- feat: 还原之前另存的配置文件 (#184) by @DuckDuckStudio in #185
- feat: 定时关机 (#176) by @Pfolg in #191

### 修复
- fix(随机展示): 在随机过程中禁止用户再次开始随机 by @DuckDuckStudio in #195

### 优化
- pref: 优化批量打包py/pyw文件工具 by @DuckDuckStudio in #196
  - fix: 如果指定的日志存储文件夹或图标文件不存在，则执行无日志/图标打包
  - style: 将 `\\` 替换为 `os.sep` 以改善兼容性
  - fix: 更正通知标题中的工具名称
- pref: 在备份和还原配置文件时不显示控制台窗口 (#199) by @DuckDuckStudio in #202

### 依赖
- build(deps): bump `configparser` from `7.1.0` to `7.2.0` in #190
- build(deps): bump `pywin32` from `308` to `309` in #189
- build(deps): bump `nuitka` from `2.6.7` to `2.6.8` in #188
- build(deps): bump `beautifulsoup4` from `4.13.3` to `4.13.4` in #201
- fix: 为工具编译添加静态链接选项以解决没有 C++ 运行时的依赖问题 (#70) by @DuckDuckStudio

-> Code by 鸭鸭「カモ」 / DuckStudio
完整提交记录: https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/compare/v1.3.7...v1.3.8
